♪ And the home of the brave... ♪

en: Morning, band.

en: Can it, people! The captain's speaking!

en: Anyways, I'm so happy to see you all here

en: and ready to work, since I know one of you
has been recovering from a little case of the lazies.

en: I wasn't lazy, I passed out.
vi: Tôi không lười biếng, tôi đã xỉu đó. Tôi đã tập kẻng tam giác chăm tới nỗi quên thở

en: I practiced the triangle so hard, I forgot to breathe.

en: Okay, I feel like I shouldn't even have to say this,

en: but everyone needs to breathe.

en: In fact, Erin, why don't you lead us

en: in a breathing exercise?
Erin?

en: Are you sleeping?

en: Oh, you weren't sleeping.

en: -Ah! I'm awake!
vi: Tôi tỉnh rồi!

en: And have been this whole time.

en: Anyways, great practice, see you guys mañana!
Erin, you were sleeping in class.

en: I really didn't want to have to do this,

en: but you left me no choice.

but I'm gonna need that jacket.

en: It's cool. You can keep it.
vi: Được thôi, cứ giữ mà xài.

en: -Redecorating? -I'm getting my frustration out

Trang trí lại nhà?
 Tôi đang cố gắng giải tỏa căng thẳng theo nghệ sỹ nhạc rock, bằng cách lật tung đồ

en: Look, I did what I had to do.

en: Of course, it was personal.

en: I invited you into my world, and you kicked me out of it.

en: It's just a trip with a band that you don't even care about.

Do you know what it's like to grow up
